name: LaSoft
description:
LaSoft is a European, business-oriented software development company that helps startups disrupt markets, get traction - by building innovative applications.
At the moment, our team consists of 80 multi-talented and experienced professionals in-house including software engineers, designers, project managers, and quality assurances.
We have extensive experience in web development using Ruby on Rails, React.js, Node.js, Angular.js, Backbone.js, HTML5, CSS3 and mobile development using Ionic.
Our company can easily suggest both an extension of your in-house team with our highly skilled and experienced developers and a turn-key solution provider in the next business domains such as e-commerce, real estate, marketplaces, law compliance, social networks, human resource management, and healthcare.
Since 2014 LaSoft has successfully delivered 40 small and big web projects to its international clients from the USA, Europe, UK, and Australia.
